whole_letter:
Dr. Sarah Thompson
ABC Eye Center
456 Elm St, Suite 202
Town, State, 23456
July 10, 2024

Dr. Michael Lee
Neuro Specialist Clinic
789 Pine Rd, Suite 303
Town, State, 78901

Dear Dr. Lee,

I am referring Ms. Jane Doe, a 38-year-old female, for urgent evaluation of blurred disc margins. Ms. Doe presented with persistent headaches, nausea, and visual disturbances over the past two weeks.

**Referral Reason:**
Examination revealed bilateral blurred disc margins, suggestive of optic nerve swelling. Visual acuity was 20/50 bilaterally. Blood tests (CBC, ESR, CRP) were normal. An MRI is scheduled to rule out intracranial causes.

Your expertise is required to determine the cause and manage her condition.

Best regards,
Dr. Sarah Thompson
ABC Eye Center
referral_content: Examination revealed bilateral blurred disc margins, suggestive of optic nerve swelling. Visual acuity was 20/50 bilaterally. Blood tests (CBC, ESR, CRP) were normal. An MRI is scheduled to rule out intracranial causes.
